io.github.mountainrange.mule.managers

Class ProductionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.mountainrange.mule.managers.ProductionManager

  • public final class ProductionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Responsible for computing production, spoilage, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • calculateProduction

        public static <T extends Tile> java.util.Map<Player,java.util.EnumMap<ResourceType,ProductionResult>> calculateProduction(WorldMap<T> map,
                                                                                                                          java.util.List<Player> playerList,
                                                                                                                          int round)
        Calculate production for the given players on the given map on the given round number. For each player, it returns a mapping from each of their resources to a ProductionResult, which describes changes in quantity due to requirement, spoilage, and production.
        Parameters:
        map - map to calculate production on
        playerList - list of players to calculate production for
        round - round number (affects food requirement)
        Returns:
        map from players to production results for each resource

      • muleProducedBy

        public static MuleType muleProducedBy(ResourceType resource)
        Get the corresponding type of mule that produces this resource. Equivalent to ResourceType.muleProducedBy().
        Parameters:
        resource - resource to get MuleType for
        Returns:
        MULE that produces the given resource

      • resourceProduced

        public static ResourceType resourceProduced(MuleType mule)
        Get the corresponding type of resource that this type of MULE produces.Equivalent to MuleType.produces().
        Parameters:
        mule - MuleType to get type of resource for
        Returns:
        resource that this MULE produces
